column5:
Welcome to my high roller dice game.
It's based on the rules of "Yahtzee" which is a copyright of Milton Bradley games.

#NewlineYou have up to 3 rolls to try and get each combination on the scorecard.
#NewlineEach scorecard category can be used only once apart from "5 of a kind" which can be used as often as needed.
#NewlineIn this version#Comma a 5 of a kind cannot be used as a wild card and must go in the "5 of a kind" box.

#NewlineType START to begin the dice game.
<srai>HIGH ROLLER</srai>
<srai>HIGH ROLLER</srai>
<srai>HIGH ROLLER</srai>
<srai>HIGH ROLLER</srai>

column3: TYPE START TO BEGIN THE DICE GAME
column5: <think>#Newline	<set name="onetotal">??</set>#Newline	<set name="twototal">??</set>#Newline	<set name="threetotal">??</set>#Newline	<set name="fourtotal">??</set>#Newline	<set name="fivetotal">??</set>#Newline	<set name="sixtotal">??</set>#Newline	<set name="threekind">??</set>#Newline	<set name="fourkind">??</set>#Newline	<set name="fullhouse">??</set>#Newline	<set name="smstraight">??</set>#Newline	<set name="lgstraight">??</set>#Newline	<set name="yatzy">??</set>#Newline	<set name="chance">??</set>#Newline	<set name="subupper">0</set>#Newline	<set name="uppertot">0</set>#Newline	<set name="lowertot">0</set>#Newline	<set name="63bonus">0</set>#Newline	<set name="grandtot">0</set>#Newline	<set name="dice1lock">0</set>#Newline	<set name="dice2lock">0</set>#Newline	<set name="dice3lock">0</set>#Newline	<set name="dice4lock">0</set>#Newline	<set name="dice5lock">0</set>#Newline	<set name="rollnumber">0</set>#Newline</think>#Newline<srai>YZROLLLOOP</srai>
